DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study see whether combination trametinib sorafenib help people hepatocellular cancer . Researchers also want find combination trametinib sorafenib safe tolerable .
DOC.brief_title: Trametinib Combination With Sorafenib Patients With Advanced Hepatocellular Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Each cycle last 4 week . Sorafenib trametinib administer orally continuous basis . During first cycle sorafenib start day 1 trametinib day 8 improve tolerance . Participants get restaging scan every 2 cycle . Participants continue receive treatment stable disease well response Response Evaluation Criteria Solid Tumors ( RECIST ) criteria 1.1 .
